differentiators: Deep experience with Claude AI and AI-assisted development workflows
Transparency-first approach - comfortable with daily reviews and fact-checking
Proven track record building marketplace MVPs under tight timelines
Fullstack expertise covering both sides of marketplace (buyers and sellers)
Clear communication and fluent English for daily standups
next_steps: Video call to discuss timeline reality and scope definition
Clarify reference app or receive wireframes
Confirm hourly rate and budget alignment
Establish code review turnaround time expectations
key_clarifications_needed: Which similar app is being referenced (99% inspiration source)
Exact hourly rate range client is considering
Wireframe availability or need for AI-generated wireframes
proposal_highlights: Honest timeline assessment (2-3 weeks more realistic than 1-2 weeks)
Transparency about challenges while showing solution approach
Workflow transparency as proof of readiness
Direct questions showing engagement and understanding
